tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor has a very calm demeanour, spends time and gives detailed explanation of the issue/treatment and instills confidence in the patients without frightening them. Does not prescribe invasive procedures or medications. We had visited for a second opinion on another doctor's referral and glad we did. Thank you, doctor.

Visited him regarding my father's heart blockages consultation and treatment. My father had total occulsion in RCA and blockages in other arteries. He explained the issue and treatment in great detail with the associated risks frankly which I really appreciate. After his consultation, I got second and even third opinion but the other doctors said more or less the same things which he did, making us trust his line of treatment fully. So we went with him for my father's angioplasty. It was smooth and we were satisfied.

I recommend him without a doubt. Trust me you won't regret.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ********* ****** ** *** ** *** **** ************* humble, caring, patient friendly and empathetic Doctor I have ever seen. He has been treating my father since 10 years. Though he is now located a bit far from the place where we stay, it always pulls us to go to him bound to his nature and the care he takes to treat the patient. I just can say this, be rest assured that you are in safe hands if Dr. Shetty is taking care of you or your family member. I cannot thank more for all sort of treatments and the care he has taken of my father. Our sincere thanks to him not just being the words. Long live dear sir.  Your service to the society is incredible.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sreekanth and Dr Chitra are simply wonderful doctors. They personify all the positive qualities that a doctor should possess. They are not just professionals of the highest order but are very friendly and kind. They put you at ease right away and you know that you are in good hands. Dr Sreekanth never advises tests unless absolutely necessary. 

They have fostered a great culture in their organization. Their front office executive Ms Shabanam is very helpful and responsive. They provide excellent video consults - a boon in these covid times. Dr Sushma who visits there is also an excellent doctor. A big thanks to Svasti and the good doctors and staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I really felt, Dr. Sreekanth is really a passionate guy towards his work. From Apollo I got heart X-ray and had some doubt regarding it and hence went to meet him on 26/08/2020. He saw the reports and told it's normal and no need to worry. I came to reception to pay consultant fee then they told that doctor asked them to not to take fee itself. When I went to doctor to ask why he is not taking fee then he told it's normal and he has done nothing for me. More ever he is very cool and composed guys.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am short of words to admire him. The way he treats, behaves makes the patient comfortable and 80% disease  gets cured before starting the  treatment . I consulted him during the lockdown over video call and then I consulted him today F2F , he still remembers me for what I consulted him
And he carried on from there on . Patient listener and empathetic doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: *** ** *** **** ************ ** ****** ********** listen the issue patiently and recommend less medicine and tests. half of the problem disappeared once you start to talk with him. I went for left side chest pain and shortness of breathing. he recommended some tests. Post the test said no issue with the heart. it's a chest muscle pain. just relax. it's all due to over thinking.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He listened to my problem very calmly and soon enough gave me the assurance that it is not a cardiac issue. I was so worried before this. Then adviced ECG which indeed showed no cardiac issue. Explained the problem and suggested that I should see a Spine specialist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It is very reassuring to know that I am in safe hands and under the expert guidance of Dr Sreekanth Shetty. He is a calm and patient listener, and very thorough in his examination, diagnosis and follow up. I found his advice to be practical. I highly recommend his consultation and care. Also, the staff at Svasti Clinic are friendly, mild-mannered, well-trained and always ready to lend a helping hand. A sincere thank you, Dr Shetty & team!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sreekanth Shetty is a well known name in the field of cardiology and his clinic Svasti at HSR Layout is overall very well maintained and definitely recommended for anything related to the heart. Doctor listens patiently and gives utmost attention to every detail before recommending anything. This centre includes a lab for ECG, Echo & TMT among others which I found be very reasonably priced. The staff personnel are very approachable too (especially one Mr Nagaraju). Thank you Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very talented doctor yet humble and empathetic. We went to Dr Sreekanth for second opinion as my husband was detected with blockage in arteries and was recommended to put stent by another cardiologist however Dr Sreekanth studied the report, explained everything very patiently and did through diagnosis again and finally we were saved from the procedure. We were very satisfied with our overall experience . Thank you so much doctor you are an angel 

Regards,
Sudha
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Consulting with Dr. Shetty is as good as it gets. When I dire situation, he set up a video/remote consultation on a Sunday and helped my mother and saved her life. He sets example for the community of doctors in handling patients and caregivers. His timely intervention and direction got my mother admired to emergency in time and started the right course of action and saved her life. Dr Shetty is a true healer.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I met Dr Shreekanth to get second opinion on my father's Angiogram. He explained the problem clearly and provided the treatment options. Dr Shreekanth's detailed explanation gave lot of understanding on exact issue and it helped to take us a decision on possible treatment. Prior to meeting Dr Shreekanth we were very confused, thanks a lot for patiently answering all our questions and explanation of the case.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have visited dr. sreekanth shetty for my mother in law cardiac  and aneurysm related issue ... my mother in law had a stroke and she could not control her left hand for few minutes... initially doctor from other hospital in Bangalore told us patient can not survive..so we were really tensed hence consulted with Dr. sreekanth shetty sir. he was very patient and looked and reviewed all reports , he gave hope and strated treatment for cardiac issue, for aneurysm  he suggested to check with neurosurgeon..after CT angio,  neurosurgeon told us that  the condition of the patient is not so critical as other told..so patient can continue with diet and medicine...this was a big relief to all  us..thank you again dr. sreekanth shetty sir for treatment and further recommendation to consult with neurosurgeon... I surely recomend sir for others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Sreekanth did not even spend 2mins, but recommended for another test Holter (Rs. 2,000) ******* ********** *** ********** ** ** ************ He did not explain about the test and the rationale behind that decision.
Indeed, there was no patient waiting and he was fully free. I was disappointed that not enough time spent in answering my question or clarity on the approach.
The Hospital also doesn't follow-up. I didn't turn up for the Holter test and no one followed-up from the Hospital.
Overall, poor service *** **** **************
reply_text: Since your identity is not known, I cannot opine on the situation. We are committed to providing evidence based care to our patients. However I appreciate your feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My mother & I visited Dr. Sreekanth at Svasti Clinic in HSR layout for my mother‚Äôs health issues. He is extremely humble, friendly & soft spoken. He listened all complaints of my mother patiently and did a physical examination. After doing some required tests, he assured us that there is nothing to worry for my mother from cardiac side. He recommended me to visit good Neurologists for my mother‚Äôs problems. Thank you Sir for all your suggestions and support. I would also like to thank Ms. Shabnam for keeping slot open for my mother as she won‚Äôt be able to wait there for longer time. Thank you for understanding my mother situation. Definitely recommend this doctor and clinic for cardiac problems.

Doctor Shetty was highly professional in approach, good listener, friendly, could understand the issue quickly and make recommendations. No undue tests or medication, which is appreciated. 
Would surely recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited Dr Sreekanth for second opinion on my father's case, who is not in Bangalore. He explained his point of view on treatment option that would have more favourable prognosis and clarified many of my doubts. I appreciate his knowledge and kind/ accommodating approach. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr is friendly and answering all my doubts  ,but not happy about the procedures.not sure ,why  was I asked to take all the tests (complete ecg, echo and tmt tests).
Just for CR rate bit high  ,went for opinion for me and my wife, Agreed for my wife had gone under all tests as  she had some symptoms. but unnecessarily I was also asked go for all the tests, I thought I will be taken only ecg,This part only I am not happy, ********* **** *******
reply_text: Thank you for your appreciation. Need for cardiac assessment was in view of background of coronary risk factors particularly diabetes . Diabetic patients are the highest risk of coronary artery disease and need periodic cardiac evaluation to detect otherwise silent coronary disease . When coronary disease manifests in diabetics it is typically associated with higher risk than in a non diabetic individuals .ECG has a poor sensitivity in detected coronary disease . Therefore the other tests . We can discuss when we meet again üëçüèª

review: Dr. Sreekanth is seeing my mother for two years now. His knowledge about the cardiac issues and the politeness towards his patients is an extremely rare combination in a Doctor today. He explains everything very clearly without any hurry at all. He wouldn't recommend medicine or tests unless really needed.I can clearly say that whenever he is around us, we feel safe for my mother.Thanks a lot Sir!!

review: Dr Sreekanth is such a nice person to interact. My waiting period was like NIL. He listened to me carefully with a great patience and to my surprise, at the end he suggested only walking and wait reduction. Though I don't prefer to have medicine but I was expecting he may suggest some medicine. But I am happy that he explained everything in detail. After meeting him my confidence boosted a lot. Thanks Dr Sreekanth.
